ModMetadata.Name: Stationpedia Ascended
ModMetadata.Author: FlorpyDorp
ModMetadata.Description:
This is a Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
An enhanced Stationpedia experience with comprehensive tooltips, in-game notepad, guides, bug fixes, and quality of life improvements. Stationpedia on a new level.
NEW IN 0.8.0: - Station Notepad: Full note-taking system with folders, rich text, and Stationpedia links - Survival Manual: Complete beginner's guide from first minutes to advanced systems - Game Mechanics: Smelting guide and Species Survival guide with data from game code - Video/Image Support: Embed media directly in Stationpedia pages - Nested Table of Contents: Multi-level TOC with smooth scrolling
Features: - Enhanced Tooltips: Hover over logic types, slots, memory, modes, and connections - Operational Details: Dedicated section showing advanced device information - In-Game Notepad: Take notes that persist across game sessions (F2 to toggle) - Comprehensive Guides: Survival, Power, Airlock, AC, and more - Bug Fixes: Fixed scrollbar handle and window dragging crashes
All tooltips and descriptions are customizable via descriptions.json.
Discord: https://discord.gg/stationeers
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: v0.8.0: Major Feature Release - Station Notepad, Guides, Media Support - NEW Station Notepad: In-game note-taking with folders, rich text, Stationpedia links - NEW Survival Manual: Complete beginner's guide (First 5 Minutes to Advanced) - NEW Game Mechanics: Smelting Guide and Species Survival Guide from game code - NEW Media Support: Embed videos and images in Stationpedia pages - NEW Nested TOC: Multi-level table of contents with smooth scrolling - Vanilla/Ascended Mode: Click header to toggle (easter egg) - Multiple guides: Power Systems, Airlock, Air Conditioning, Daylight Sensor v0.3.0: AIMeE documentation, multi-column TOC, new JSON schema features v0.2.2: Search optimizations, property tooltips, IC10 helpers v0.2.1: Enhanced search with smart grouping, visual headers, debris filtering v0.1.x: Initial releases with tooltips, operational details, bug fixes
